data.name: UltraGanttView_Exception_CannotAssignUnassociatedProject
data.value: The project cannot be assigned to the UltraGanttView because it is not associated with the same UltraCalendarInfo instance.

data.name: UltraGanttView_TaskDialogDisplaying
data.value: Fired before the TaskDialog is displayed.

data.name: TaskDialog_ShowNotSupported
data.value: The TaskDialog does not support non-modal display. Use the ShowDialog method to launch the dialog.

data.name: UltraGanttView_DisplayTaskDialog_Exception_CalendarInfoNotAssociated
data.value: The TaskDialog cannot be displayed because the task and this control are not associated with the same UltraCalendarInfo.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidRowNumberError
data.value: Please enter a valid row number.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidTaskDependencyTypeError
data.value: Please enter a valid task dependency type.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidTaskNameError
data.value: Please enter a valid task name.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidTaskNameOrRowNumber
data.value: An invalid Row Number and Task Name pair was found. Please use valid Task Name and Row Number.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidOwnerError
data.value: Invalid Owner found. Please use a valid value.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidResourceNameError
data.value: Please enter a valid resource name

data.name: TaskDialog_NullOwnerError
data.value: The owner should not be null.

data.name: ResourceParseError_MessageBoxText
data.value: One or more of the specified resources do not exist.{1}Would you like to add the following resource(s): '{0}'?

data.name: UltraGanttView_Exception_ActiveTaskNotAssociated
data.value: '{0}' belongs to a different project than the one currently being displayed by the control, and cannot be designated as the ActiveTask.

data.name: UltraGanttView_TaskDeleting
data.value: Fired before the user deletes a Task.

data.name: UltraGanttView_TaskDeleted
data.value: Fired after the user deletes a Task.

data.name: UltraGanttView_TaskAdding
data.value: Fired before the user adds a Task.

data.name: UltraGanttView_TaskAdded
data.value: Fired after the user adds a Task.

data.name: UltraGanttView_CellActivating
data.value: Fired before a cell is activated in the grid portion of the control.

data.name: UltraGanttView_CellActivated
data.value: Fired after a cell is activated in the grid portion of the control.

data.name: UltraGanttView_CellDeactivating
data.value: Fired before a cell in the grid portion of the contrl is deactivated.

data.name: UltraGanttView_Description
data.value: Windows Forms control which presents a WinSchedule Project, along with its Tasks, using a grid on one side and a timeline on the other.

data.name: LD_Timeline_AutoAddAdditionalInterval
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean value indicating whether a weekly DateTimeInterval automatically appears above the PrimaryInterval.

data.name: LD_Timeline_AdditionalIntervals
data.value: Returns a collection of DateTimeInterval-derived instances which define the date/time intervals that appear above the PrimaryInterval.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ColumnHeaderAppearance
data.value: Returns or sets the appearance for the headers which represent the PrimaryInterval and the members of the AdditionalIntervals collection.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ColumnAutoSizing
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the ColumnWidth property is set to the ideal width for the PrimaryInterval when the user double-clicks the adjustable area of the header.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ColumnSizing
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the user can change the value of the ColumnWidth property by dragging the right edge of a PrimaryInterval column header.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ColumnWidth
data.value: Returns or sets the width, in pixels, of the ColumnHeaderUIElements for the PrimaryInterval and the TimeSlotUIElements.

data.name: LD_Timeline_DependencyLinkColor
data.value: Returns or sets the color of the lines and arrows which indicate a TaskDependency on the timeline.

data.name: LD_Timeline_DrawDependencyLines
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean value indicating whether lines are drawn to depict a TaskDependency on the timeline.

data.name: LD_Timeline_HorizontalScrollSettings
data.value: Returns a HorizontalScrollSettings instance which defines the small and large increments for the horizontal scrollbar.

data.name: LD_Timeline_MinimumColumnResizeWidth
data.value: Returns or sets the minimum value to which the ColumnWidth property can be changed during a resize operation.

data.name: LD_Timeline_NonWorkingHourAppearance
data.value: Returns or sets the appearance for TimeSlotUIElements which appear in the non-working hour range.

data.name: LD_Timeline_WorkingHourAppearance
data.value: Returns or sets the appearance for TimeSlotUIElements which appear in the working hour range.

data.name: LD_Timeline_PrimaryInterval
data.value: Returns or sets the DateTimeInterval-derived instance which is represented in the bottom row of column headers, and which defines the smallest time interval in effect for the control.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettings
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettings instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a task tooltip appears.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettingsSummary
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettingsSummary instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a task tooltip appears for a summary task.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettingsMilestone
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettingsMilestone instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a task tooltip appears for a milestone task.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettingsPercentComplete
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettingsPercentComplete instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a tooltip appears for a task's PercentComplete indicator.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettingsDeadline
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettingsDeadline instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a tooltip appears for a task's Deadline indicator.

data.name: LD_Timeline_ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency
data.value: Returns the ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency instance which determines the information that is displayed to the user when a tooltip appears for a TaskDependency.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_AutoDisplayDefaultContextMenu
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the default context menu is automatically displayed when the user right-clicks within the appropriate area of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_Appearance
data.value: Gets/sets the main appearance for the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_AutoDisplayTaskDialog
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the TaskDialog is automatically displayed when the user double-clicks within the appropriate area of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_ChartAreaWidth
data.value: Returns or sets a value which determines the width of the chart area of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_GridAreaWidth
data.value: Returns or sets a value which determines the width of the grid area of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_GridSettings
data.value: Returns a GridSettings instance which determines grid-specific properties of the task, such as the appearance of the row and the settings for the cells.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_HorizontalResizeMode
data.value: Returns or sets the manner in which the control reacts to changes in its width.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterAppearance
data.value: Returns or sets the appearance for the VerticalSplitterUIElement which separates the grid area and the chart area of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterEnabled
data.value: Returns or sets whether the vertical splitter which separates the grid area and chart area is enabled in the user interface.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterMinimumResizeWidth
data.value: Returns or sets a value which determines the minimum value to which the GridAreaWidth and ChartAreaWidth properties can be set via a resize operation with the vertical splitter.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterWidth
data.value: Returns or sets a value which determines the width of the VerticalSplitterUIElement which separates the grid and chart areas of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TimelineSettings
data.value: Returns an object which exposes properties that provide a way to customize the timeline-related aspects of the control.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TaskSettings
data.value: Returns a TaskSettings instance which determines whether the user can edit or delete tasks.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_Timeline_ColumnHeaderInitializing
data.value: Fired immediately before the child elements are initialized for a ColumnHeaderUIElement, giving listeners the opportunity to change the text and/or image that is displayed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TimelineColumnHeaderToolTipDisplaying
data.value: Fired before a tooltip is displayed for a ColumnHeaderUIElement.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TimelineDateNavigationButtonClicked
data.value: Fired when a DateNavigationButtonUIElement is clicked, giving listeners the opportunity to change the action that is taken.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TimelinePrimaryIntervalChanged
data.value: Fired when the PrimaryInterval has changed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TimelineVisibleDateTimeRange
data.value: Fired after the date range returned by the VisibleDateTimeRange property has changed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterDragging
data.value: Fired when the VerticalSplitterUIElement is in the process of being dragged by the user.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_VerticalSplitterDragged
data.value: Fired when a drag operation involving the VerticalSplitterUIElement is terminated normally by the user.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TaskDialogDisplaying
data.value: Fired before the TaskDialog is displayed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_ContextMenuInitializing
data.value: Fired before the control's custom ContextMenu is displayed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_ResourceParseError
data.value: Fired when the user leaves the Resources field in the task grid with one or more invalid values.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TaskElementDragging
data.value: Fired during the course of a drag operation for a Task element.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TaskElementDragComplete
data.value: Fired when a drag operation for a Task element has been successfully completed.

data.name: LD_UltraGanttView_TaskToolTipDisplaying
data.value: Fired before a tooltip is displayed for a task element.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_Appearance
data.value: Returns or sets the Appearance object which controls visual formatting for the tooltips displayed by the control.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayName
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's Name property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayStartDateTime
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's StartDateTime property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayDuration
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's Duration property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayEndDateTime
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's EndDateTime property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayDeadline
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's Deadline property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayPercentComplete
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's PercentComplete property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayCompleteThrough
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the task's CompleteThrough property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayTitle
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether a title should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_Title
data.value: Returns or sets the string that is displayed as the title for the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DateTimeFormat
data.value: Returns or sets the format that is applied to the dates/times displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettings_DisplayToolTip
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether a tooltip is displayed.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency_Appearance
data.value: Returns or sets the Appearance object which controls visual formatting for the tooltips displayed for a TaskDependency.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency_DisplayTaskDependencyType
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the value of the DependencyType property should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency_DisplayPredecessor
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the predecessor task's name should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: LD_ToolTipSettingsTaskDependency_DisplayDependent
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the dependent task's name should be displayed in the tooltip.

data.name: SummaryTaskException_CannotSetPercentComplete
data.value: The percentage of completion cannot be set on a summary task. The percentage of completion for a summary task is determined by its sub-tasks.

data.name: TaskDialog_InvalidTaskContraint
data.value: Please enter a valid Task Constraint Value
